name: A SMART POCONG (BETA)
description:
Are you ready to learn Russian while being scared? This game is for you. A 2D android game where you can learn Russian for free while being scared. Pocong is an Indonesian ghost dressed with white clothes and it is said to be the soul of a dead person trapped in its shroud.

Alternative download :

https://www.mediafire.com/file/z2vmxrn0ebfuatn/a_smart_pocong.apk/file 

Note!

This game is a BETA version, I'm looking forward to make the full version of this game for PC in the near future. So, follow me to get more updates!

More info :

Developed by : Givantaro Agusta

Status : BETA Version

Development app : Max2D

Programming language : Visual Scripting

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Song : REPULSIVE - Forgotten

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
